ADDITIONAL_DESCRIPTION:
Part NumberTL14AM7-600PM
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPM finish - SF4
Size6"
Weight Lb1.9950
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PM Finish- SF4 (OD= 32Ra- markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Part NumberS02A40C3EV
DescriptionShut-Off T Body Clamp
ActuatorPneumatic style: double acting (air-to-air)
Material316L Stainless Steel
ElastomerFKM
Stem Seal TypeFKM O-Ring
Size4"
Connection TypeClamp
Weight Lb36.4800
Applications

Used in sanitary processes for the isolation of fluids. These valves are found in the food processing, beverage, dairy, personal care, winery, brewery, and pet product markets.

Specifications
Maximum holding pressureSee below Holding Pressure Chart as they are dependent upon size and configuration of the valve.
Maximum operating temperature266°F (130°C)
Surface ID finish< 32Rₐ
Maximum sterilization temperature (20 min/max)275°F (135°C)
Elastomers are FDA and 3A compliant Sizes1" to 4"
Construction
All product contact steel components316L stainless steel
All non-product contact steel components304 stainless steel
Products wetted seal elastomersFKM or EPDM
Stem seal materialsFKM, EPDM or PTFE
Available Options

Clamp and weld connections standard, other types available upon request

Available with a pneumatic actuator or manual handle

Burkert Control Top Model No.s 8691, 8681, and 8692 are available. See below Part Number Key for configurations available.

Optional 15Ra, 20Ra or 25Ra finishes available.

Safety notes

WARNING. Cancer and Reproductive Harm- www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

Part NumberT14VB-250PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size2-1/2"
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Part NumberRZL-440B-1V-KIT
DescriptionSingle O-ring Seal Repair Kit
Includes2 - O-ring, rotor FKM, 2 - O-ring, rotor case FKM, 2 - Ceramic Coated Sleeve
Used onJRZL-400 Series
MaterialFKM
Mandatory Pkg/Box Qty1
Safety notes

WARNING. Cancer and Reproductive Harm- www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

Part NumberT14VB-400PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size4"
Weight Lb1.5300
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Part NumberRZL-440B-4E-EK
DescriptionDouble Mechanical Seal Pump Elastomers
Includes2 - O-Ring, rotor bolt, EPDM, 2 - O-ring, rotor, EPDM, 2 - O-ring, rotor case, EPDM, 2 - O-ring, case, double seal EPDM, 2 - O-ring, shaft, double seal EPDM, 1 - O-ring, front cover, EPDM
Used onJRZL-400 Series
MaterialEPDM
Mandatory Pkg/Box Qty1

Part NumberS01A25B2EV
DescriptionShut-Off L Body Weld
ActuatorPneumatic style: spring return (air-to-lower)
Material316L Stainless Steel
ElastomerFKM
Stem Seal TypeFKM O-Ring
Size2-1/2"
Connection TypeWeld
Weight Lb29.9500
Applications

Used in sanitary processes for the isolation of fluids. These valves are found in the food processing, beverage, dairy, personal care, winery, brewery, and pet product markets.

Specifications
Maximum holding pressureSee below Holding Pressure Chart as they are dependent upon size and configuration of the valve.
Maximum operating temperature266°F (130°C)
Surface ID finish< 32Rₐ
Maximum sterilization temperature (20 min/max)275°F (135°C)
Elastomers are FDA and 3A compliant Sizes1" to 4"
Construction
All product contact steel components316L stainless steel
All non-product contact steel components304 stainless steel
Products wetted seal elastomersFKM or EPDM
Stem seal materialsFKM, EPDM or PTFE
Available Options

Clamp and weld connections standard, other types available upon request

Available with a pneumatic actuator or manual handle

Burkert Control Top Model No.s 8691, 8681, and 8692 are available. See below Part Number Key for configurations available.

Optional 15Ra, 20Ra or 25Ra finishes available.

Part NumberT22MP-100PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size1"
Weight Lb0.8500
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

ActuatorPneumatic style: double acting (air-to-air)
Material316L Stainless Steel
ElastomerFKM
Stem Seal TypePTFE Plug Seal
Size1"
Connection TypeClamp
Weight Lb7.0100
Applications

Used in sanitary processes for the isolation of fluids. These valves are found in the food processing, beverage, dairy, personal care, winery, brewery, and pet product markets.

Specifications
Maximum holding pressureSee below Holding Pressure Chart as they are dependent upon size and configuration of the valve.
Maximum operating temperature266°F (130°C)
Surface ID finish< 32Rₐ
Maximum sterilization temperature (20 min/max)275°F (135°C)
Elastomers are FDA and 3A compliant Sizes1" to 4"
Construction
All product contact steel components316L stainless steel
All non-product contact steel components304 stainless steel
Products wetted seal elastomersFKM or EPDM
Stem seal materialsFKM, EPDM or PTFE
Available Options

Clamp and weld connections standard, other types available upon request

Available with a pneumatic actuator or manual handle

Burkert Control Top Model No.s 8691, 8681, and 8692 are available. See below Part Number Key for configurations available.

Optional 15Ra, 20Ra or 25Ra finishes available.

Safety notes

WARNING. Cancer and Reproductive Harm- www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

Part NumberT21MP-075050PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size3/4" x 1/2"
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Part NumberT22MP-250PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size2-1/2"
Weight Lb1.3050
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

ActuatorPneumatic style: spring return (air-to-lower)
Material316L Stainless Steel
ElastomerFKM
Stem Seal TypeFKM O-Ring
Size3"
Connection TypeClamp
Weight Lb36.4600
Applications

Used in sanitary processes for the isolation of fluids. These valves are found in the food processing, beverage, dairy, personal care, winery, brewery, and pet product markets.

Specifications
Maximum holding pressureSee below Holding Pressure Chart as they are dependent upon size and configuration of the valve.
Maximum operating temperature266°F (130°C)
Surface ID finish< 32Rₐ
Maximum sterilization temperature (20 min/max)275°F (135°C)
Elastomers are FDA and 3A compliant Sizes1" to 4"
Construction
All product contact steel components316L stainless steel
All non-product contact steel components304 stainless steel
Products wetted seal elastomersFKM or EPDM
Stem seal materialsFKM, EPDM or PTFE
Available Options

Clamp and weld connections standard, other types available upon request

Available with a pneumatic actuator or manual handle

Burkert Control Top Model No.s 8691, 8681, and 8692 are available. See below Part Number Key for configurations available.

Optional 15Ra, 20Ra or 25Ra finishes available.

Safety notes

WARNING. Cancer and Reproductive Harm- www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

Part NumberT14VB-300PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size3"
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

Part NumberRZL-440B-2V-EK
DescriptionSingle Mechanical Seal Pump Elastomers
Includes2 - O-Ring, rotor bolt, FKM, 2 - O-ring, rotor, FKM, 2 - O-ring, rotor case, FKM, 1 - O-Ring, front cover, FKM
Used onJRZL-400 Series
MaterialFKM
Mandatory Pkg/Box Qty1
Safety notes

WARNING. Cancer and Reproductive Harm- www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

Part NumberT22MP-200PL
Material316L Stainless Steel
FinishPL finish - SF1
Size2"
Weight Lb1.2000
Applications

High Purity BioPharm fittings are commonly used in pharmaceutical, bioprocessing, semiconductor, cosmetics, food processing and beverage markets

Specifications

All fittings are manufactured to meet the latest edition of the ASME BPE International Standard, Bioprocessing Equipment.

316L stainless steel material and dimensions meet all orbital welding specifications with controlled sulphur.

3-A Sanitary Standards for Sanitary Fittings, Number 63-03 (Authorization number 621).

PL Finish – SF1 (OD=32R a- a)

Note

Product markings per ASME BPE 2012 DT-10.1

Product markings include job number, 316L, part number, heat number(s), surface finish code, ASME BPE

Per the specification, the size of the fitting may limit the space available for markings. When that occurs, not all markings are included.

The part number will describe the part configuration and size.

MTR (Material test report) certifications are included inside the resealable bag with each fitting. The MTRs are traceable through the Job Number found on each fitting. All fittings are capped to prevent damage and contamination. For easy identification each finish will have a different color cap; PL finish has blue caps and PM finish has white caps.

ActuatorPneumatic style: spring return (air-to-raise)
Material316L Stainless Steel
ElastomerEPDM
Stem Seal TypePTFE Plug Seal
Size2"
Connection TypeClamp
Applications

Used in sanitary processes for the isolation of fluids. These valves are found in the food processing, beverage, dairy, personal care, winery, brewery, and pet product markets.

Specifications
Maximum holding pressureSee below Holding Pressure Chart as they are dependent upon size and configuration of the valve.
Maximum operating temperature266°F (130°C)
Surface ID finish< 32Rₐ
Maximum sterilization temperature (20 min/max)275°F (135°C)
Elastomers are FDA and 3A compliant Sizes1" to 4"
Construction
All product contact steel components316L stainless steel
All non-product contact steel components304 stainless steel
Products wetted seal elastomersFKM or EPDM
Stem seal materialsFKM, EPDM or PTFE
Available Options

Clamp and weld connections standard, other types available upon request

Available with a pneumatic actuator or manual handle

Burkert Control Top Model No.s 8691, 8681, and 8692 are available. See below Part Number Key for configurations available.

Optional 15Ra, 20Ra or 25Ra finishes available.

Safety notes

WARNING. Cancer and Reproductive Harm- www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
